website_summaries.verdict: The Vivitek Qumi Q5 is a handsome, highly portable, DLP-based LED projector with a good range of connection choices.
pros: Solid text quality in our tests
cons: Shows scaling artifacts at native resolution
Subpar video, with rainbow artifacts and poor dynamic range
Dim for its rated brightness when projecting video

customer_reviews.title: Fine Projector for IPAD - needs better instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product to project from an IPAD or mac book onto the wall. It does a lovely job and is bright enough to show good images in a "not very dark" room. It is fairly small and easy to hook up to IPAD. So what is the downside? The instructions are not real clear on how to get it to display the IPAD pictures. Turns out you need to use the remote (not the buttons on the projector). If you use the remote then it is not hard to figure out. Great machine but a little improvement is needed for the instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Paul F. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor movies
customer_reviews.text: I saw many of these projectors used by the Hollywood Costume Exhibit at the Phoenix Art Museum and they worked beautifully so I thought I would check them out. I was looking for something compact that I could set up easily to show movies outside and this works great. I combined it with a Jawbone speaker, a small but sturdy tripod, and a USB thumb drive full of movies and I have a theater to go. I can't speak for other projectors... so do some homework for what you need, but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Smith

customer_reviews.title: Practical *and* cool!
customer_reviews.text: I am getting a lot of use from this little gem, and a lot of comments every time I pull it out of its wrapping (so tiny! so bright! so cool!). As I hoped, it is bright enough to give talks in rooms that cannot be darkened completely. And best of all, no worries about a super expensive and delicate bulb that has to be cooled down before unplugging.
customer_reviews.author: Diane in Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable pico
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday and was very pleased with quality and brightness of projection. Travel for work and needed small projector for delivering training and leading meetings. This is compact and has great features. Having a choice of colors was a nice bonus. Bought an amazon portable electronics pouch and it holds unit with all cables and my remote /pointer. Only downside is there is no place to screw in a tripod.
customer_reviews.author: oztrucks

customer_reviews.title: The quality isn't that bad, however when there's a white image that's super ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality isn't that bad, however when there's a white image that's super bright, it wouldn't display well and it will turn everything that's bright white into purple! It doesn't bothers me much cause I use it during the night. But it suck balls if there's daylight around.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyTechBoy

customer_reviews.title: wish this had advisory that it needs a dongle to ...
customer_reviews.text: wish this had advisory that it needs a dongle to get full wifi connection not to find out after it arrives that its missing a critical piece
customer_reviews.author: frank corbett

customer_reviews.title: Qumi Q5 top of the line
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before purchasing this unit. We travel a lot out of the country and just used this unit at Christmas 2013. Our hotel had no white walls so I hung a white sheet on the wall and the picture was still amazing. I did not give 5 star because speaker is not great but that really did not matter for me because I have mini travel speakers. I would recommend 100 %.
customer_reviews.author: s.p.t

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PROJECTOR!
customer_reviews.text: it's awesome. no complaints. watch video right off a usb drive or thumb drive. also connected the blu-ray player via the hdmi cable and looked great. so far I've had it for ten months with no problems yet! internal speaker is very weak so you'll need external speakers that's about! would absolutely recommend it over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Some people said that the remote is useless because the sensor is on the back
customer_reviews.text: Some people said that the remote is useless because the sensor is on the back, however i find that it works very effectively from the side and i often use the projector on my ceiling at my bedside.
customer_reviews.author: James Aviles

customer_reviews.title: Good in Daylight
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice, compact projector that handles daylight images pretty well. We haven't been able to get it to work with our Samsung devices though, so only 4 stars. The online user guide leaves a little to be desired also.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Good for projecting larger computer screen.
customer_reviews.text: This little projector is just right for my uses. I have hooked it to my computer and use it to read the computer screen on a back lit larger screen. Love the small size.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best budget HD projectors you can find. Great compatibility, image quality and size - lot's of accessories come with it. Materials don't convince but fear nothing, it delivers like a beast. Go for refurbished; you won't have many color choices but you will save ~$200 and get same quality & accessories as in new.
customer_reviews.author: Phil P.

customer_reviews.title: Great teaching tool!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for teaching while on field trips with University students. It's amazing how far these small projectors have come. I can get a very clear image for a room of 15-20 students to see clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Knappett

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is great. We use it at home and project on ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the classroom if I do not have a class with a projector. The picture quality is great. We use it at home and project on the wall. We can easily get a six or seven foot screen that is perfectly sharp. It may replace the movie theater for us.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Plug into my i phone and I can enjoy watching netflix
customer_reviews.text: As someone who travels light and hates the idea of complicated moves, this little monster delivers in terms of quality and its specs. Just weighing over a pound I can stuff this sucker in my back pack and take it with me wherever I go. Plug into my i phone and I can enjoy watching netflix, HBO Go or just about any content carrier without all the fuss of complicated, heavy equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Guillaume Mimoun

customer_reviews.title: Very good. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Fast delivery. Manual and basic cable included. You have to buy separately mini HDMI, micro HDMI and mini Display Port (for apple) to HDMI Type A cable if needed.
customer_reviews.author: John Abuton

customer_reviews.title: Neat and handy. I no longer have to draw ...
customer_reviews.text: Neat and handy. I no longer have to draw the curtains in daytime (as long as the sun isn't shining through the windows). I run it with a Chromecast, and I'm getting a bluetooth transmitter for the sound. That way I have a portable home cinema!
customer_reviews.author: Rost Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Takes a little work to figure out how ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Takes a little work to figure out how to set it up and get it working but once that's done it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: WEG

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Good picture quality. Don't lose the remote because the buttons on the machine don't do everything.
customer_reviews.author: blueridgeenergy

customer_reviews.title: We love it! Great resolution
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Great resolution, doesn't take that much space so we can put it away any time we are not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Polita

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for work or home
customer_reviews.text: Good quality image, easy to set up, small lightweight, note, you'll need to buy an adaptor to use apple products
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Dave

customer_reviews.title: Never thought the quality would have been this good but it is
customer_reviews.text: Yes it this item did meet and exceeded my expectations to be quite honest. Never thought the quality would have been this good but it is ..i've been busy recommending this product to all of my friends and friends of friends.money well spent on my part yess .im loving it
customer_reviews.author: kingsley v edwards

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pocket-size as we use this both at home and on overseas trips. The sound is weak for a large group, but we just added an external speaker used for iPod in the past and it worked fine. Used in a 17x22 room within 6 feet of the screen, aimed up at a pretty sharp angle. Everyone can read/see/hear. Keystone correction is at the max but works.
customer_reviews.author: D Ellen McDonald

customer_reviews.title: I am quite pleased with the definition of the projected image
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with the definition of the projected image, which is the primary reason to have a projector. I was surprised that it didn't include a usb to usb cord, though. Small things are important, as well. It does project a quality image, though and the HDMI cord is sufficient for connecting it to my Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Myers

customer_reviews.title: This is a great item to take camping or at home
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item to take camping or at home. Not much power needed, although will require lights to be off or in dark room. At 10 ft, allows for 7 ft long horizontal screen great. Best to have higher definition recorded videos though as lower ones can pixelate. Device runs great with saved videos on a micro USB. Also works great with Bose Mini Speaker connected as well for sound. Sound from the device alone is too low and terrible, unless its only you sitting right next to it and area is completely silent or using headphones.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Great projected picture and so easy to travel with!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Krosschell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and we love it to watch movies on!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: What I had hoped for or even better
customer_reviews.text: Very handy device. Does exactly what I was hoping. It does have a little less brightness / lumen than you might need in SOME viewing conditions, but in 90% of cases it is more than adequate. And the form factor is GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Karl H. Eggestad

customer_reviews.title: wrong Product shipped
customer_reviews.text: Sent back wrong product.. Q5 shipped (was worth a lot more then this unit) In retrospect i should have kept the Q5 for a mobile unit.
customer_reviews.author: Printer Pro

customer_reviews.title: does what it says
customer_reviews.text: this did just what everyone said. it was weak in view movies in bright areas, but otherwise it does a great job or the weight and size. I ran my external hard drive off it and didn't need a comp. just a low volume issue in one file, so worth the money if you need the portability.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher McGlynn

customer_reviews.title: Good thing in a small package.
customer_reviews.text: excellent for it's size. I only need this to project a screen that is about 3ft in size. It does this great even in eco mode. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: William Lee

customer_reviews.title: what the Q2 should have been
customer_reviews.text: comparing the Q5 to the Q2, the brightness isn't all that different, despite 67% higher lumens. however, the focus issues the Q2 had due to poor quality control have been eliminated; focus is now uniform across the entire picture.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Ian Staker

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I like it... Very practical size... very good resolution... Only thing is Slow turning presentation slides from USB, dont have this problem while connecting my laptop. Overall its GREAT....
customer_reviews.author: Shery

customer_reviews.title: Great projector. Works great and very compact
customer_reviews.text: Great projector. Works great and very compact. I use a Mac computer and always seem to have connection issues with other projector.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J.

customer_reviews.title: does what it needs to do
customer_reviews.text: Use it for work, it has great range and is easy to use. I settled for a slightly dimmer bulb, it hasn't been to much of an issue but I can see where it is a little of a short coming in an office where you can not dim the lights. I have found more contrasting colors work better. Other then that, it has lightened the load for training material. I do wish it came in a bit bigger of a case but I will be looking in to a pelican soon enough.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel CO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that their is on mounting point for a tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Dixon Patrick

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: small, portable, easy to use, decent projection on a range of surfaces and environments.
customer_reviews.author: rubyg

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The projector is small and light, easy to use and surprisingly bright and clear. I use for power point in classes . Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Barron

customer_reviews.title: I've bought this now three times for different people - ...
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this now three times for different people - everyone at the office loves it and wants their own!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: great picture from such a small projector. I use it everyday for 6-8 hours, and its still looking great, thanks
customer_reviews.author: bobbyqmark

customer_reviews.title: bad design I would say
customer_reviews.text: The stand always had trouble in last 3 months or so of buying it. Never quite keep it where we wanted it to be. Now the bottom is broken seems by stand, bad design I would say :(
customer_reviews.author: Kamlesh Shah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This projector is excellent, your image is very clean. Excellent resolution... Very good in illuminated ambient. Very compact and light.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo S. Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, 500 lumens is more than enough even ...
customer_reviews.text: Great projector, 500 lumens is more than enough even with lights on in the background. I love this, have not had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful projector!
customer_reviews.text: The Vivitek Qumi 5 is perfect for those makings small group presentations on the go with its compact size, easy set-up and operation. Purchasing a collapsible tri-pod to use with it is recommended. For sound projection better quality is achieved with an accessory speaker, especially in a group setting. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L. Baranowski

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS!!! Mine died before the year was out. I now have to try to get someone to make good on my $500 plus investment. Does not work well at all!!!! Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J. Ganim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This projector has a surprisingly bright image in a lit room!
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: It's great, but only when it works
customer_reviews.text: So, first of all... I was impressed when I got it. It is really light and small. I was worried about all the reviews that said it was loud and about the brightness. For multimedia is great, the problem is watching movies, and only in really clear conditions. At night, in home, it's really great. And the fan is not that loud. My 2010 Macbook Pro is much worse. However, it just stopped working after a few days, and I wasn't even using it that much. I am getting a system fan error. Apparently, it's not communicating with the projector. So I'm still thinking about what I should do. Maybe I'll just get a refund and buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Leandro Damasceno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for a pocket projector
customer_reviews.text: This Vivitek unit is small to travel with and connects easily to my laptop. It performs flawlessly and is easy to use. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J B.

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: i just research for portable projector with good quality and high resolution that's is the vivitek q5 solve the problem
customer_reviews.author: Abdulrahman

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this product is too bad
customer_reviews.text: The power adaptor not works after used serval minutes , I have to use a compatible power adaptor which used for laptop! I will never buy vivitek products again.
customer_reviews.author: andrew.shen

product_meta.title: Vivitek Qumi Q5 500 Lumen WXGA HD 720p HDMI 3D-Ready Pocket DLP Projector with 4GB Memory (White)
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThe Qumi Q5, the next generation of Vivitek's series of HD LED pocket projectors, has a brightness level up to 500 lumens and weighs only 1.1 pounds. The Qumi Q5 features a DLP Pico chipset and BrilliantColor technologies from Texas Instruments and wireless capability. The Qumi's sleek design and connectivity options allows it to be used with a variety of other portable devices, including, but not limited to smartphones, laptops, netbooks and tablets, digital and video cameras. Versatile and portable, the Vivitek Qumi Q5 is perfect for sharing digital content at work and play. Standard Accessories Power Adapter, Universal I/O to VGA Cable, HDMI Cable, 3.5mm AV-in Cable, Carrying Pouch, Remote Control, User Manual (CD) Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card.
feature_bullets: 4GB built-in memory and USB port for memory expansion; connectivity options include: HDMI, Universal I/O, AV mini-jack, mini-jack audio-out to display content without a PC
3-D ready via DLP link and wireless capability through optional WiFi USB dongle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars121 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
